com.vogon101.game.lib.vogongame.platform

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vogon101.game.lib.vogongame.platform.Mob

  • public class Mob
extends java.lang.Object
    Contact with any mob will kill the player unless he jumps on its head or the player's logic is overridden.
    Author:
    Freddie Poser

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mob(Level level_)
      Constructor
      If you use this constructor you MUST set the x and y position BEFORE drawing setPos(double x, double y)
      Mob(Level level_, double x, double y)
      Constructor
      Starting point of player contained in x and y

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      The mob's render method
      Override to add custom rendering otherwise it will default to a square (size set by user (setSize(int w, int h)) or default 64x64 and colour red or set by user ((double r, double g, double b)) unless texture is set (Texture texture)
      void logic() 
      void setColour(double r, double g, double b)
      Set a colour for use when rendering the default quad (@link GL11.glColor3d}
      void setPos(double x_, double y_)
      Set the x and y coordiantes of the mob.
      void setSize(int w, int h)
      Set the size of the quad to be rendered
      void setSpeed(int xSpeed_, int ySpeed_) 
      void setTexture(java.lang.String path)
      Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
      Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
      void setTexture(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String type)
      Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
      Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
      void setTexture(org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture)
      Set the texture to a pre-loaded texture

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mob

        public Mob(Level level_)
        Constructor
        If you use this constructor you MUST set the x and y position BEFORE drawing setPos(double x, double y)
        Parameters:
        level_ - This is the level that contains this mob (ie: something that extends Level)

      • Mob

        public Mob(Level level_,
   double x,
   double y)
        Constructor
        Starting point of player contained in x and y
        Parameters:
        level_ - This is the level that contains this mob (ie: something that extends Level)
        x - The starting x position
        y - The starting y position

    • Method Detail

      • logic

        public void logic()

      • draw

        public void draw()
        The mob's render method
        Override to add custom rendering otherwise it will default to a square (size set by user (setSize(int w, int h)) or default 64x64 and colour red or set by user ((double r, double g, double b)) unless texture is set (Texture texture)

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture)
        Set the texture to a pre-loaded texture
        Parameters:
        texture - A pre loaded texture (Use VogonTextureLoader)

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String path)
                throws VogonGameException
        Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
        Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
        Parameters:
        path - - The path of the PNG image
        Throws:
        VogonGameException - - Thrown when the image can't be loaded

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String type)
                throws VogonGameException
        Load a new texture to use for rendering from PNG image
        Uses VogonTextureLoader which extends TextureLoader
        Parameters:
        path - - The path of the PNG image
        type - - The file extention/type of image ie PNG or JPG
        Throws:
        VogonGameException - - Thrown when the image can't be loaded
